text:
Mitch McConnell's new coronavirus "relief" proposal is an utter disgrace.

It somehow manages to make the pandemic and economic pain even worse.

Based on what we know, here are some of the most disgraceful elements of this half-baked, watered-down, corporate-bailout proposal:
